subject: GUI for guet init command
description:
As a committer i want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet init command, so that it is easier to use the program.

Acceptance criteria: 

1)Accept and validate repository path 

2) Check if git is initialized

3)check if guet is initialized

4) if either git or guet are not  initialized display message stating the same and provide a button to initialize guet configuration.

5) if guet is already initialized display a method statin it is already initialized.

subject: GUI for guet add command
description:
As a committer I want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet add command so that it is easier to use the program.

Acceptance criteria:

1)Accept commiters identifier, name and email address 

2)If committers details are already present display a warning message stating the data will be ovewritten.

2.1)  If proceed button is clicked go ahead with the operation and over ride the data.

2.2)  If cancel is clicked abort the operation.
3) If commiter details are not present already go ahead and add the committer.

subject: GUI for get command
description: As a committer, I want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet get command so that it is easier to use the program.

subject: GUI for set command
description: As a committer, i want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet set command so that it is easier to use the program.

subject: GUI for remove command
description: As a committer, i want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet remove command so that it is easier to use the program.

subject: GUI for yeet command
description: As a committer, i want the guet program to provide the GUI for guet yeet command so that it is easier to use the program.

subject: Get team members from taiga
description:
As a team lead, I want the program to fetch the team members so that I don't have to add them manually.

Acceptance criteria:

1.  connect with the taiga API.
2.  pull team member information.
3.  Add team members as committers.
4.  A print message asking if all team members must be set as current committers.
5.  Accept yes/no response to the above message.
6.  If Yes set all team members as current committers and print current committers.
7.  If No end the process & Print all committers

subject: Initializing guet issue.
description:
As a developer i want the program to respond by stating guet is already initialized if the repository has already had a guet configuration so that I can check if it is already initialized.

Acceptance criteria:

1.  check if guet is already initialized.
2.  If it is initialized print the message stating a config already exists.
3.  Initialize config and print “successfully Initalized” if config does not exist already.

subject: Delete guet configuration is not working
description:
As a developer i want the guet yeet command's output to state if the config is removed or not depending on whether there was a config before, so it is clear to me whether the config is removed or if there exists no config before.

Acceptancecriteria:  When the Yeet command is runned. 
1) If there is guet folder it should print  " guet tracking removed from this repository"
2) If there is no guet folder it should print "No local guet configuration for this project"

subject: integrate git to verify committers.
description: As a project manager, I want the committers to be verified so that the integrity of the committers is maintained.

subject: Pairing strategy
description:
As a team lead, I want the program to mention the pairing strategy in every commit so that it makes the job easy.

Acceptance criteria:

1.  Accept pairing strategy as a parameter, while using set command.
2.  Add pairing strategy to the co-author list.
3.  Commits to github should include a pairing strategy.

subject: Add pairing strategy to get command
description: As team lead, I would like to see pairing strategy for current committers, so that it is easier to check which combination is used to pair developers

subject: Add the names of committers to comments on taiga task
description: As a project manager, I want guet to push a comment on taiga with the names of people working on the task, so that I can see who is working on which task.

subject: Alphabetize committers list
description:
As a developer, I want to see the committers list in an alphabetical order, so it is easy to search for people in the list
Acceptance criteria: Display the list of committers in an alphabetical order "geut get all"and "geut get current".

subject: Validate email address while adding committer
description: As a project manager, I want guet to validate email addresses, so that no incorrect email addresses can enter the commit messages on github

subject: Remove all committers
description: As a team lead, I want to be able to remove all committers with a single command, so that it is easier when I need to clear all committers
